org.gitlab.api.http

类 GitlabHTTPRequestor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gitlab.api.http.GitlabHTTPRequestor

  • public class GitlabHTTPRequestor
extends java.lang.Object
    Gitlab HTTP Requestor

    Responsible for handling HTTP requests to the Gitlab API

    作者:
    @timols

        public GitlabHTTPRequestor method(java.lang.String method)

        Has a fluent api for method chaining.

        参数:

        返回:

      • to

        public <T> T to(java.lang.String tailAPIUrl,
       java.lang.Class<T> type,
       T instance)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the HTTP(S) connection, submits any data and parses the response. Will throw an error
        参数:
        tailAPIUrl - The url to open a connection to (after the host and namespace)
        type - The type of the response to be deserialized from
        instance - The instance to update from the response
        返回:
        An object of type T
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
